products.name: Sole Rattan Lounge Chair
products.description: A relaxed yet refined lounge chair handwoven from natural rattan, paired with matte black legs. Its organic texture and warm tone embody effortless modern comfort.

products.name: Marigold Accent Chair
products.description: An inviting armchair in a rich golden hue, grounded by sleek black legs. A statement of warmth and modern restraint—made for quiet corners and thoughtful pauses.
products.warrantyInformation: 1-year limited warranty on frame and fabric

products.name: Arden Textured Vase Trio
products.description: A trio of handcrafted clay vases in warm, neutral hues with natural matte finishes. Designed to introduce organic depth and quiet sophistication to any space.

products.name: Luna Brown Leather Sofa
products.description: A low-profile three-seater sofa wrapped in supple brown leather with warm undertones. Its sleek silhouette and deep cushions bring understated luxury to any modern space.

products.name: Terra Blue Artisanal Bowls
products.description: Handcrafted terracotta bowls finished in soft blue glaze with subtle textural variations. A refined decorative accent or functional tableware for serene dining spaces.

products.name: Arlo Wood Set
products.description: A collection of handcrafted wooden plates and bowls, each piece highlighting natural grain and smooth finish. Designed for both casual dining and elevated table presentation.
products.shippingInformation: Ships in 5–8 business days with eco-friendly packaging.

products.name: Aurora Lounge Duo
products.description: A contemporary seating set wrapped in warm amber upholstery, paired with slim metal legs for a balanced blend of comfort and poise. Perfect for slow mornings or evening conversations.
products.warrantyInformation: 2-year limited warranty for upholstery and frame

products.name: Willow Picnic Table
products.description: A timeless outdoor picnic table crafted from smooth wood and sleek metal legs. Designed for relaxed gatherings in nature, its minimal lines and natural tones evoke calm sophistication.
products.shippingInformation: Ships in 5–7 business days with free delivery.

products.name: Blush Knit Throw
products.description: Handcrafted with care, this soft crochet blanket features a radiant starburst pattern in warm blush and ivory hues. A luxurious accent that adds texture and serenity to any space.

products.name: Eclat White Ceramic Vases
products.description: A duo of curved white ceramic vases with a glossy finish and sculptural presence. Perfect for styling shelves or tables with a minimalist, elevated touch.

products.name: Forma Wooden Planter Set
products.description: A geometric duo of wooden planters with soft natural grains and lush artificial greenery. Brings sculptural warmth and subtle luxury to modern interiors.

products.name: Haven Kitchen Shelf
products.description: A curated white kitchen shelf showcasing ceramic essentials, glass jars, and touches of greenery. Its clean lines and soft tones reflect modern simplicity and effortless style.
products.shippingInformation: Ships within 7 business days with secure packaging.

products.name: Ember Bistro Set
products.description: A striking red metal table and chair set that brings modern vibrance to outdoor dining. Bold yet refined, it offers a perfect balance of contemporary charm and everyday comfort.
products.warrantyInformation: 1-year limited warranty against rust or paint damage.
products.shippingInformation: Ships in 5–10 business days via standard delivery.

products.name: Marble Aura Nesting Tables
products.description: A sculptural pair of nesting tables featuring smooth white marble tops and brushed gold frames. Designed to blend function with refined elegance for contemporary living spaces.

products.name: Celeste Knit Throw
products.description: A soft crochet throw in soothing mint and cream tones, crafted to add a gentle layer of warmth to any sofa or reading nook. Light, airy, and effortlessly refined.

products.name: Sienna Wall Display
products.description: A sculptural wooden wall shelf with clean, asymmetric lines—designed to curate your favorite objects with quiet elegance. Ideal for candles, ceramics, or trailing greens.

products.name: Sol Cutting Boards
products.description: A refined set of natural wooden cutting boards in varying sizes, each crafted for durability and elegant presentation. Perfect for meal prep or serving with understated grace.
products.warrantyInformation: 3-year warranty for structural integrity and finish.

products.name: Haven Knit Blanket Set
products.description: A luxuriously soft knitted blanket set in muted neutral tones, crafted for comfort and effortless layering. Perfect for cozy evenings and timeless interiors.
